TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but they are reckless and cause the number of deaths caused by science accidents to skyrocket, and you are responsible, because you wished for it!

I wish I were better at flying British aircraft in War Thunder.

Granted, but everyone else also gets better, thus setting you at the same disadvantage as before.

I wish my home improvement would be done already.

Granted. They were rushed so they did a horrible job.

I wish I could get the soundtrack of Life is Strange and the soundtrack of Rise of Nations out of my head for at least one day!

Granted, afterwards, those soundtracks are the only things you hear in your slowly more insane mind.

I wish for Azimech to kindly make me a practical car running on solar energy and one RTG

Granted, but the battery capacity is so low that it can't support extended duration driving.

I wish it didn't take so much time to brew tea in the morning.
Granted, but it was cold.
I wish Poland can into space.

Granted. They use 20yr old tech. All countries are aheade of it, even Canada has sent people to Venus.

I wish to become a Meme Lord.
You become a meme lord, but no one gets your witty humor. I wish for it to be Saturday again...

Granted, except it's the worst Saturday in the world

I wish I was an astronaut

Granted, but your first mission is STS-51-L

I wish I had a DeLorean time machine

Granted, It ends up in 1885 with a broken engine.

I wish for some sushi.

Granted, it's lethal.

I wish to become a Meme Lord who can make anyone happy and laugh.

Granted, but they can't stop laughing, and after some time they grow to hate you because of what you've done to them.

I wish I had more money

Joke's on you, SaturnianBlue, if I had a time machine, I would take it back to 1885 and destroy it. I just needed it to escape modern society!!!

Granted, you're tried for robbing a bank, and become bankrupt to pay for legal stuff. 2yrs prison for you as well.

I wish I was a Meme Lord who made everyone happy, and everyone also made him happy.

Granted, but I have you executed as you threaten my title of Supreme Emperor of the Memes.

I wish for SPAddict to remember he promised me a SSTO.

Granted, he's so caught up with other things, he forgets again.

I wish Sanic could share his DankMemeLord title

Granted. Srsly. Remember power corrupts those who wield it.

I wish I had moar Dank Memes.

Granted, then...

I wish for long-range SSTO building powers.

Granted, but you are attacked by the Kraken every time you leave Kerbin's atmosphere.

I wish to go faster.

Granted, but you crash into a brick wall.

I wish that my rockets don't need 10 revisions to do what they're supposed to do.
Granted, they are supposed to end the universe, along with you of course.

Granted, I will not corrupt your not made wish therefore corrupting it still.

I wish for stock actuators/rotors in KSP.

Granted, they make less thrust than an ion engine.


I wish for a new car to use for the Elcano Challenge

Granted, but everyone beats you. To death !

I wish for a copy of Mass Effect : Andromeda.
